es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.elements
Class Element

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.elements.Element
All Implemented Interfaces:
Described, Detailed, Documented, HasId, Named, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Atrezzo, Barrier, Item, NPC
public abstract class Element
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Named, HasId, Documented, Described, Detailed

This class holds the common data for any element in eAdventure. Here, element means item or character
